item.title: CVE-2024-22768|2024-01-23T05:00:57.719Z -- Hitron Systems -- DVR HVR-4781
item.description: Improper Input Validation in Hitron Systems DVR HVR-4781 1.03~4.02 allows an attacker to cause network attack in case of using defalut admin ID/PW.
